mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.ordernum AS "ordernum", a.inquirynum AS "inquirynum", a.maker AS "maker", a.checker AS "checker", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "update", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM account_purchase a
a.del_flag = 0
AND a.title LIKE concat('%',#{title},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_purchase( id, title, ordernum, inquirynum, maker, checker, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{ordernum}, #{inquirynum}, #{maker}, #{checker}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{update}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT ap.title as title FROM account_purchase ap WHERE ap.proc_ins_id='end'
